org.orgName: United States District Court For The Western District of Washington Northern Division

div1.p: Territory of Washington, County of Pierce } BS.
To the Sheriff or any Constable of said County:

To Ta Ward, Mrs. Whittan Mr Reich.............. In the name of the United States you are hereby requested to appear before the undersigned, one of the Justices of the Peace in and for said county, on the forthwith day of ............ A.D. 1885 at ....... o'clock in the .... noon at his officeCourthouse, in Tacoma, Pierce County, W.T. to give evidence in a certain cause, then and there to be tried, between The Territory of Washington ....Plaintiff,............. Defendant on the part of Defendant........ Given under my hand this 22st day of July A.D. 1885...
